parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Account search string. This parameter accepts wildcards (*).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to return. Default to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size to return. Default to 100 accounts per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term based on security code or security description.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Unique application ID to be used as an application reference.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client ID provided by Praemium.

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client secret provided by Praemium.

SponsorOrIssuer.description: Is the security held with a sponsor or issuer.

HinOrSrn.description: Is the security transfer held under a HIN or SRN.

Amount.description: Amount of regular transaction from the account.

Frequency.description: Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly = 6, Annually = 12, Quarterly = 13, HalfYearly = 14.

CommencementDate.description: The commencement date of the regular transaction.

TerminationDate.description: The termination date of the regular transaction.

Amount.description: Amount of regular cash contributions to the account.

Frequency.description: Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly = 6, Annually = 12, Quarterly = 13, HalfYearly = 14.

InitialTransferValue.description: Estimated total in-specie value for transfers into the account.

FeeType.description: FeeTable = 0, Contribution = 1, Establishment = 2, Termination = 3, Withdrawal = 4, Ongoing = 5.

IsPercent.description: Whether the fee is a percent.

Usages.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

RegularWithdrawal.description: Bank account to be used for regular withdrawals.

RegularContribution.description: Bank account to be used for direct debiting regular contribution plan.

AccountSetup.description: To be used for regular SMA accounts.

AdviserId.description: Adviser ID to create the application under.

EntityType.description: The entity type of the account. Individual = 0, Trust = 1, Corporate = 2, Partnership = 3, Superfund = 4, Joint = 5.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code of the account.

Id.description: Unique application ID to be used as an application reference.

EntireBalance.description: Whether the entire balance of the external fund account will be transferred.

ExpectedAmount.description: Expected contribution amount to be transferred. Set if ContributionSources.EntireBalance is false.

TransferFromAccountId.description: Account ID of the other SuperSMA account to transfer to this account.

TransferMethod.description: WholeAmountWithClose = 0, WholeAmountKeepOpen = 1, SpecifiedAmount = 2 - whether the source account will be kept open.

Amount.description: If Account.Transfers.TransferMethod is WholeAmountKeepOpenSpecifiedAmount, the amount to be transferred.

ContributionType.description: Concessional_Employee = 11, Concessional_Personal = 12, Concessional_OtherFriendsAndFamily = 13, NonConcessional_Personal = 21, NonConcessional_SpouseAndChild = 22, NonConcessional_FirstHomeSaverAccount = 23, Exempt_CGT_15Year = 31, Exempt_CGT_Retirement = 32, Exempt_PersonalInjuryElection = 33, Other_GovernmentCoContribution = 41, Other_LowIncomeSuperContribution = 42, Downsizer = 43.

ExpectedAmount.description: Expected other contribution amount to be transferred.

Transfers.description: Contains details on other SuperSMA account(s) to be transferred to this account.

OtherContributions.description: Contains details of other assets that will be used to fund this account.

EmployerContributions.description: Contains details of other assets that will be used to fund this account.

InitialInvestmentAmount.description: The amount of cash that will be invested in the account.

InitialInvestmentType.description: Concessional_Employee = 11, Concessional_Personal = 12, Concessional_OtherFriendsAndFamily = 13, NonConcessional_Personal = 21, NonConcessional_SpouseAndChild = 22, NonConcessional_FirstHomeSaverAccount = 23, Exempt_CGT_15Year = 31, Exempt_CGT_Retirement = 32, Exempt_PersonalInjuryElection = 33, Other_GovernmentCoContribution = 41, Other_LowIncomeSuperContribution = 42, Downsizer = 43.

ContributionType.description: Concessional_Employee = 11, Concessional_Personal = 12, Concessional_OtherFriendsAndFamily = 13, NonConcessional_Personal = 21, NonConcessional_SpouseAndChild = 22, NonConcessional_FirstHomeSaverAccount = 23, Exempt_CGT_15Year = 31, Exempt_CGT_Retirement = 32, Exempt_PersonalInjuryElection = 33, Other_GovernmentCoContribution = 41, Other_LowIncomeSuperContribution = 42, Downsizer = 43.

RegularContribution.description: Contains details of the regular contribution plan for this account.

AdviserId.description: Adviser ID to create the application under.

EntityType.description: The entity type of the account. Individual = 0, Trust = 1, Corporate = 2, Partnership = 3, Superfund = 4, Joint = 5.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code of the account.

UseExisting.description: Link an existing SuperSMA accumulation account to the pension account.

TransferMethod.description: WholeAmountWithClose = 0, WholeAmountKeepOpen = 1, SpecifiedAmount = 2 - whether the source account will be kept open.

Amount.description: Specifies the amount of the transfer from the existing account.

Transfers.description: Contains details on other SuperSMA account(s) to be transferred to this account.

OtherContributions.description: Contains details of other assets that will be used to fund this account.

Consolidation.description: Establish an accumulation account. You can open an accumulation account in the same application alongside a pension account. Only available for SuperSMA Pension.

PensionPayments.description: The payment amount paid from the pension account. Only available for SuperSMA Pension.

CentrelinkSchedule.description: If a Centrelink schedule is required.

AdviserId.description: Adviser ID to create the application under.

EntityType.description: The entity type of the account. Individual = 0, Trust = 1, Corporate = 2, Partnership = 3, Superfund = 4, Joint = 5.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code of the account.

ValuationDate.description: Account valuation date or asat date.

ConsolidationType.description: None = 78, Portfolio = 80, Transaction = 84, FeeGroup = 85, ShareTrader = 86, SuperFund = 87.

EntityType.description: Individual = 0, Trust = 1, Corporate = 2, Partnership = 3, Superfund = 4, Joint = 5.

Id.description: ModelId as returned by the Models endpoint.

ValueAppliedFrom.description: Date the value is applied from.

MinAmountWithTax.description: Fee overwrite minimum amount with tax.

MaxAmountWithTax.description: Fee overwrite maximum amount with tax.

Type.description: FeeTable = 0, Contribution = 1, Establishment = 2, Termination = 3, Withdrawal = 4, Ongoing = 5.

DefaultValueWithTax.description: Default value of overwrite with tax.

Usage.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

Description.description: This will advise the bank account usage.

IsMandatory.description: If the bank account is mandatory, true or false.

HelpText.description: Help text with regards to the bank account.

MaxNoOfBankAccounts.description: Maximum number of bank accounts allowed by the PDS.

IsSuperSma.description: If the PDS is specific to SuperSMA.

Status.description: Status of the PDS, active = 1, closed = 2.

Fees.description: The fees associated to the PDS.

BankAccountUsages.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

IsAllowedByApl.description: Is the security allowed by the Approved Product List.

PepDetails.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

Capacity.description: Director = 0, SoleDirector = 1, CompanySecretary = 2, Partner = 3, Trustee = 4, SignedUnderSeal = 5, SignificantShareholder = 6, Beneficiary = 7.

PepDetails.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

MissingReasonText.description: Reason identification of applicant is missing.

Identifications.description: Array of TFN / TIN / ABN / NIN.

ContactIsSignatory.description: Whether the contact is a signatory on the account.

TradingName.description: Trading name of the corporate applicant.

PepDetails.description: If applicant is politically exposed, details must be supplied.

Title.description: Title: Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, Doctor, Lady, Prof and Sir.

DateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the individual.

Phone.description: Primary contact number of the individual.

OwnerAdviserId.description: Owner adviser ID to create the application under.

Usages.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

Name.description: Name of the Trust or Fund.

Abn.description: ABN of the Super Fund (rather than the corporate trustee) for corporate applicants.

TransferMethod.description: WholeAmountWithClose = 0, WholeAmountKeepOpen = 1, SpecifiedAmount = 2 - whether the source account will be kept open.

Proportion.description: The portion of the benefit that should be paid to the beneficiary. These must add up to 100%.

Cash.description: Select if the initial investment will include cash.

Shares.description: Select if the initial investment will include shares.

AccountType.description: Company = 13, Individual = 14, Trust = 15, SuperSmaAccumulation = 16, SuperSmaPensionAbp = 17, SuperSmaPensionTtr = 18.

OwnerAdviserId.description: Owner adviser ID to create the application under.

Applicants.description: Objects containing the applicant data. There must be at least one applicant for the request to succeed. The array of objects may contain a mix of Individual and Corporate applicants.

Accounts.description: Array of accounts to be opened with the application. Must be linked to an included applicant.

AdviserId.description: Adviser ID to create the application under.

OwnerAdviserId.description: Owner adviser ID to create the application under.

ApplicationId.description: Unique application ID to be used as an application reference.

Status.description: Draft = 0, AwaitingSignature = 1, AwaitingApproval = 2, AwaitingFund = 3, Funded = 4, Trading = 5, ClosureRequested = 6, Closed = 7, Deleted = 8.

ApplicationId.description: Unique application ID to be used as an application reference.

Application.description: The ID of the application the user will be sent to once logged in. Platform = 0, InvestorPortal = 1, AdviserPortal = 2, ApplicationPortal = 3.

UserId.description: ID of the user to log in. Either UserId or Username is required.

expires_in.description: After how many seconds an access token will expire.

ext_expires_in.description: Extended lifetime of access token if value of this field is greater than value of expires_in.

access_token.description: Access token that can be used to access public API endpoints.
